SELECT ei.id, ei.material_id, ei.user_id, ei.integral, ei.create_date,
ui.code as userCode, ui.NAME as userName, ui.phone as userPhone, ui.images as userImages,
mi.name as materialName, mi.content, mi.images as materialImages, mi.integral as materialIntegral
FROM exchange_info ei LEFT JOIN material_info mi ON (mi.id = ei.material_id) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON (ui.id = ei.user_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND mi.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryFrom.materialName},'%')
AND ui.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryFrom.userName},'%')
ORDER BY ei.create_date DESC
